name: Bless my good right arm (Kingdom Hearts fan tutorial)
name_original: Bless my good right arm (Kingdom Hearts fan tutorial)
description:
"BLESS MY GOOD RIGHT ARM"

A Kingdom Hearts II.9 prelude

—

Synopsis: After Riku is named Keyblade Master, Sora leaves Yen Sid's tower alone, claiming there's something he has to do. He returns to Traverse Town in the Sleeping Realm, looking for the Spirit companions that have helped him on his journey.

Estimated length: 15-20min.

—

This Twine interactive story is an alternate tutorial to Kingdom Hearts III, meant to be played right after the opening cinematic. It replaces the canon tutorial, or rather ties it more clearly into the narrative. It is also a study of the main character's state of mind at the start of this new adventure.

Whether you are new to the series or a long-time fan, I hope you enjoy these little missing scenes :)

—

All background pictures are reworked screenshots from the original games.
